description.en:
1. Sekkusu Gokko (Playing Sex)
Brother and sister found a sex tape in their father's drawer and guess what game that inspires them to play.

2. Shimai Don! (Sisters BANG!)
Mika asks Yukata-kun to her house to help her study. When Mika's older sister accidentally spills juice over Yukata, fun in the bath follows.

3. Deruderu Model (Up and Coming Model)
A school club full of horny female painters and a young male model, guess what happens.

4. Boku wa Otoko no Musume。 (I'm a Trap。)
Young woman finds a girl on the bus, wearing almost nothing and looking ill. Concerned, she helps the girl off the bus to tend to her--and discovers the "girl" is actually a guy. This boy loves to cross-dress and then exhibit himself. Our young heroine is captivated by this very cute boy and offers to help clean him off after the mess he made...

5. Koori no Shojo (The Ice Maiden)
Still waters run deep, and, in the case of a girl know as the 'Ice Maiden', VERY DEEP, as her co-student Murokoshi finds out firsthand.

6. Sotsugyou Shichae!! (Graduate!!)
Yoshiki graduates from Middle school and from being a virgin.

7. Yobai Mura (Night Creeping Village)
A amateur photografer is stuck in the countryside, but during his night there, he won't be taking photos or getting sleep...

8. Oniichan Gokko (Brother Playing Pretend)
Brother is playing with himself wearing his sisters school uniform, sisters catches him red-handed and, as expected, joins the fun.

9. Oneechan no Onani (My Sister Masturbates)
Brother catches his sister doing exactly what the title says and joins the game.

10. Maza- Fwakka (Motherfucker)
The story about a boy, who is exactly what the title says and his girlfriend joining the game.

11. Boku wa Oneechan!!? (I'm My Sister!!?)
Brother and sister switching bodies by accident and finding out, how it feels to have sex in a body of the opposite gender.

TAGS

-mixed: body swap, ffm threesome, group, incest, mmf threesome, oyakodon, shimaidon, twins
